Initializer# init(device:decay:epsilon:optimizerDescriptor:)

iOS 12.0+iPadOS 12.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.14+tvOS 12.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    device: any MTLDevice,
    decay: Double,
    epsilon: Float,
    optimizerDescriptor: MPSNNOptimizerDescriptor
)
```
